title: Research in IDC (at a glance)
body:
## About this visualisation/how to operate Purpose of the visualisation is to help analyse different things about research in IDC. Like when was the first paper was published in X domain or what is the general trend of research in a domain, etc. It is an interactive visualisation and I have tried to narrate story using a visualisation, _more like ask questions to the visualisations_. One can operate it like a presentation (Back and forward arrows)
